name: Mg-post-contributors
tagline: This wordpress plugin helps admin user to select multiple authors of the post and show them after post content at front end.
body:
### Welcome to  mg-post-contributors

This wordpress plugin helps admin user to select multiple authors of the post and show them after post content at front end. By simply selecting those at post editor window. To see result click on "View Post".

```
$ cd  maheshwaghmare / mg-post-contributors
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
